data.name: Your Show Has Been Cancelled Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack for Your Show Has Been Cancelled. It features 20 tracks of in game music and two bonus piano tracks.
You will receive a folder containing the OST in both .mp3 and .flac formats along with a copy of the album art.

The music in this soundtrack was specifically organized and arranged to give the best possible album listening experience.

The Your Show Has Been Cancelled Original Soundtrack was composed by SATURSHAKE.
